text: LaDell Andersen (October 25, 1929 â€“ December 29, 2019) was an American college and professional basketball coach. He was born in Malad City, Idaho. He coached for Utah State Aggies, Utah Stars and for BYU Cougars. He played for Utah State University. Andersen died on December 29, 2019 in St. George, Utah at the age of 90.Former BYU, USU coach Ladell Andersen, 90, passes away ==References== ==Other websites== * Basketball Reference.com page Category:1929 births Category:2019 deaths Category:American basketball players Category:Sportspeople from Idaho Category:Sportspeople from Utah
title: LaDell Andersen
